scripts.start: concurrently 'cd app1; pnpm dev' 'cd app2; pnpm dev'
scripts.build: concurrently 'cd app1; pnpm build' 'cd app2; pnpm build'
scripts.serve: concurrently 'cd app1; pnpm serve' 'cd app2; pnpm serve'
scripts.clean: concurrently 'cd app1; pnpm reset' 'cd app2; pnpm reset'
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
